c.sp: library|Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law|GWE|GWE.1|GWE.1.3|GWE.1.3.030

c.x: The Program is administered under specified guidelines and does not discrim
Program benefits are available to any Tribal Member who meets such guidelin
Program benefits are for the "promotion of the general welfare";
Program benefits are not Lavish or Extravagant; and
Program benefits are not Compensation for services.

The Program has written guidelines specifying how individuals may qualify f

The benefit is not Compensation for services; and
